description: Relaxed light blue denim jeans with subtle fading, styled here with a casual plaid shirt.
Slim-fit solid black trousers that create a sleek silhouette, contrasting sharply with white sneakers.
Classic beige chino pants with a straight-leg cut, serving as a neutral base for a denim-on-denim look.
Dark blue skinny jeans featuring light whiskering and cuffed hems, perfect for active, everyday wear.
